q: Hello Muffin, welcome to my Gingerbread House! You look tired. Are you hungry?

yes.q: Wonderful - would you like some sweet cake or do you prefer some delicious children...I mean chicken soup?

soup.q: Eat, eat my darling! You will get strong and tender...sorry, slender! When you finish your soup, you should have dessert. Dont you think?

answers.okay: Eat some pudding to fill you up! Don't you look delicious darling!?
answers.yes please: Eat this cheese wheel! I wont take no as an answer!
answers.you are very persuasive: I know, darling, and you are very delicious!

cake.q: There you go! Blackforest cake! eat it all up! Can I get you anything else?

Im full!.q: No way, you barely ate anything. Let me help you! Open up wide

answers.I cant!: Ill feed you! You will be a delicious little snack!
answers.I feel sick: Let's fatten you up just a tiny bit more...

More please!.q: Good, good my sweetpea! I love little children like you ...especially for dinner! I mean as company of course! You want another dessert?

answers.yes: Wonderful - eat whatever you like. The whole house is make from cake! Eat eat eat!
answers.no: I wont take no for an answer...

no.q: Are you sure? My cakes are the best in the whole wide land! At least have a bite!

answers.okay: Wonderful - I'll go and get you some from the kitchen. Why don't you take a seat in this comfortable cage...ehem..I mean couch!
answers.no: Oh you are such an ungrateful person! Get out of house!
